additional_data: * All gatherings for work on the body and for departures for day trips during the tango camp  will always be in front of the Culture center, except when announced otherwise. Also, departure to each destination will be exactly on the specified times.

activities.description: 21:00 – 02:00       OPENING MILONGA, DJ Sonja      High school
17:00 – 18:30     Workshop for intermediate and advanced level   / Darko y Sonja      High school
18:45 – 19:45      Tango aerobics ( introductory, lighter training )      Primary school
11:30 - 13:30      Work on the body in nature: Vibrant life      Meeting point in front of Culture Center*;
17:00 – 18:30      Workshop for complete beginners  / Mirko y Marija     High school
17:00 – 18:30       Workshop for intermediate and advanced level / Darko y Sonja         Primary school
